description:
The Essential boxer briefs are made of luxurious Tencel Lyocell with a hint of spandex that moves with you. The front pouch cradles you during any activity, and flatlock seams prevent chafing or discomfort in sensitive areas.

  • Super-soft Tencel Lyocell and spandex is breathable and smooth for all-day comfort
  • Contoured pouch with functional fly provides excellent support
  • Flatlock seams throughout ensure a chafe-free wear
  • 3in. inseam
name: Patagonia Essential Boxer 3 Inch Briefs - Men's
